name: parseStaticArray
function 1
parse name
status flags
func:
// msg.payload is array of 14 uint16 (regs 67-80 from main read)
// Assume flow.get('warningBitmap1') for reg 195 (set from separate read)

const regs = msg.payload;
const warningBitmap1 = flow.get('warningBitmap1') || 0;  // Fallback 0

// Helper to get active items from bitmap
function getActive(bitMap, mapObj) {
  const active = [];
  for (let bit = 0; bit < 16; bit++) {
    if (bitMap & (1 << bit)) {
      active.push(mapObj[bit] || `Unknown Bit${bit}`);
    }
  }
  return active;
}

// Fault mappings from doc (sections 2.2-2.5)
const faultMap0 = { // Reg 67
  0: 'F1: AC Output Undervoltage Shutdown',
  1: 'F2: AC Output Overvoltage Shutdown',
  2: 'F17: AC BackFeed Fault (AC1 L1)',
  3: 'F18: AC BackFeed Fault (AC1 L2)',
  4: 'F19: AC BackFeed Fault (AC2 L1)',
  5: 'F20: AC Backfeed Fault (AC2 L2)',
  6: 'F21: AC Backfeed Fault (L1L2 Weld)',
  7: 'F22: AC Backfeed Fault (Line 1 Weld)',
  8: 'F23: Anti-Islanding Fault (Over Freq)',
  9: 'F24: Anti-Islanding Fault (Under Freq)',
  10: 'F25: Anti-Islanding (Over Freq)',
  11: 'F26: Anti-Islanding (Under Freq)',
  12: 'F27: Anti-Islanding (Over Voltage Line 1)',
  13: 'F28: Anti-Islanding (Over Voltage Line 2)',
  14: 'F29: Anti-Islanding (Over Voltage)',
  15: 'F30: Anti-Islanding (Over voltage L1L2)'
};

const faultMap1 = { // Reg 68
  0: 'F31: Anti-Islanding (Over Voltage L1 Slow)',
  1: 'F32: Anti-Islanding (Over Voltage L2 Slow)',
  2: 'F33: Anti-Islanding (Over Voltage L1L2 Slow)',
  3: 'F34: Anti-Islanding (Under Voltage L1 Slow)',
  4: 'F35: Anti-Islanding (Under Voltage L2 Slow)',
  5: 'F36: Anti-Islanding (Under Voltage L1L2 Slow)',
  6: 'F37: Anti-Islanding (Under Voltage L1 Fast)',
  7: 'F38: Anti-Islanding (Under Voltage L2 Fast)',
  8: 'F39: Anti-Islanding (Under Voltage)',
  9: 'F40: Anti-Islanding (Under Voltage L1L2 Fast)',
  10: 'F41: APS Under Voltage',
  11: 'F42: APS Over Voltage',
  12: 'F44: Battery Over Temperature',
  13: 'F45: Capacitor Over Temperature',
  14: 'F46: Controller Error',
  15: 'F47: DC Under Voltage Immediate'
};

const faultMap2 = { // Reg 69
  0: 'F48: DC Under-Voltage Shutdown',
  1: 'F49: DC Over-Voltage Shutdown',
  2: 'F51: EEPROM Error',
  3: 'F52: EEPROM Error (Cal Fail)',
  4: 'F53: EEPROM Error (Config Fail)',
  5: 'F54: EEPROM Error (Default Fail)',
  6: 'F55: EEPROM Error (Log Fail)',
  7: 'F56: EEPROM Error (Strings Fail)',
  8: 'F57: FET1 Over-Temperature Shutdown',
  9: 'F58: FET2 Over-Temperature Shutdown',
  10: 'F59: Configuration Copy Error',
  11: 'F60: Invalid Fault',
  12: 'F61: Invalid Warning',
  13: 'F62: Invalid Interrupt',
  14: 'F63: AC Overload (Primary)',
  15: 'F64: AC Overload (Secondary 1s)'
};

const faultMap3 = { // Reg 70
  0: 'F65: AC Overload (2s)',
  1: 'F66: System Configuration Error',
  2: 'F67: Watchdog Reset',
  3: 'F68: Transformer Over-Temperature',
  4: 'F69: Synchronization Signal Fault',
  5: 'F70: Three Phase Configuration Fault',
  6: 'F90: External BMS Disconnected',
  7: 'F71: Battery Discharge Over Current',
  8: 'F72: External Contactor Malfunction',
  9: 'F73: Battery Charge Over Current',
  10: 'F74: Battery Under Voltage',
  11: 'F75: Battery Over Voltage',
  12: 'F91: SOC Level Lost',
  13: 'F92: Gateway Comms Lost',
  14: 'F93: SunSpec Controller Comms Lost'
};

// Warning mappings (sections 2.6, 2.16)
const warningMap0 = { // Reg 71
  0: 'W44: Battery Over Temperature',
  1: 'W45: Capacitor Over Temperature',
  2: 'W48: DC Under Voltage',
  3: 'W49: DC Over Voltage',
  4: 'W57: FET1 Over Temperature',
  5: 'W58: FET2 Over Temperature',
  6: 'W63: AC Overload',
  7: 'W64: AC Overload',
  8: 'W68: Transformer Over Temperature',
  9: 'W70: Check Phase Configuration',
  10: 'W94: Remote Power Off',
  11: 'W95: Equalize Abort',
  12: 'W96: Cannot Equalize',
  13: 'W97: Battery Temperature Sensor Failure',
  14: 'W500: Lost Network Connection',
  15: 'W501: Non Volatile Memory Warning'
};

const warningMap1 = { // Reg 195
  0: 'W91: SOC Level Lost',
  1: 'W92: Gateway Comms Lost',
  2: 'W93: SunSpec Controller Comms Lost'
};

// Parse
const faults = [
  ...getActive(Number(regs[0]), faultMap0),  // 67
  ...getActive(Number(regs[1]), faultMap1),  // 68
  ...getActive(Number(regs[2]), faultMap2),  // 69
  ...getActive(Number(regs[3]), faultMap3)   // 70
];

const warnings = [
  ...getActive(Number(regs[4]), warningMap0),  // 71
  ...getActive(warningBitmap1, warningMap1)    // 195
];

const configErrorsPresent = (Number(regs[13]) << 16) + Number(regs[12]) > 0;  // Reg 79-80 uint32
const configErrors = configErrorsPresent ? ['Configuration Errors Detected (Raw Value: ' + ((Number(regs[13]) << 16) + Number(regs[12])) + ')'] : [];  // No detailed bits in doc

const status = {
  active_faults: !!Number(regs[9]),  // 76
  faults: faults,
  active_warnings: !!Number(regs[10]),  // 77
  warnings: warnings,
  config_errors: configErrors
};

// Assemble JSON
msg.payload = { status };
return msg;

name: AC parameters
